title: Optimized Science Education Design through Analysis of Learning Environment Perception Differences [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Scientific Knowledge, Experience with Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Project-based training program for science field employment preparation

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose discrepancies in perceptions of the learning environment between learners and instructors with 80% accuracy.
Learners can design three or more customized instructional strategies based on perception gap patterns.
Learners can improve learning environment satisfaction by 20% through a real-time feedback system utilizing digital tools.
Learners can apply perception gap resolution strategies to actual educational settings via project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
